All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppController
Controller class for the Pizza Maker application.
Cocktail
The Cocktail class represents a cocktail item in the pizza maker application.
DatabaseManager
 
DBConfig
Interface representing the configuration for connecting to the Pizza Maker application database.
Dessert
The Dessert class represents a dessert item in the pizza maker application.
FontLoader
FontLoader is a utility class for loading custom fonts into a Java Swing application.
Food
An abstract class representing a general concept of food in the pizza maker application.
ImageLoader
ImageLoader is a utility class for loading images into a Java Swing application.
ImageResizer
ImageResizer is a utility class for resizing images in a Java application.
Main
The main class of the Pizza Maker application.
MainFrameView
Represents the main frame of the Pizza Maker application.
ManagerView
Represents the ManagerView component of the Pizza Maker application.
Order
Represents an Order in the pizza maker application.
Order.Status
 
OrderManager
Manages a collection of Order objects within the pizza maker application.
OrderView
Represents the OrderView component of the Pizza Maker application.
Pizza
Represents a Pizza in the pizza maker application.
PizzaCustom
Represents a customized pizza in the pizza maker application.
SButton
SButton is a custom JButton class that applies predefined styles from the Style interface.
SButton.ButtonType
Enum for different button types supported by SButton.
SFrame
SFrame is a custom JFrame class that applies predefined styles from the Style interface.
SLabel
SLabel is a custom JLabel class that applies predefined styles from the Style interface.
SLabel.FontStyle
Enum for different font styles supported by SLabel.
SList<T>
A custom JList implementation with enhanced UI features.
Soda
 
Soda.BottleType
 
SPanel
SPanel is a custom JPanel class that uses predefined styles from the Style interface.
SScrollPane
The SScrollPane class is a customized JScrollPane that adheres to the application's styling theme.
SSplitPane
A customized split pane class that extends JSplitPane.
STextArea
STextArea is a custom JTextArea class that applies predefined styles from the Style interface.
STextArea.FontStyle
Enum for different font styles supported by STextArea.
Style
The Style interface contains constants for colors and fonts used throughout the application.
Wine
Represents a Wine in the pizza maker application.
Wine.BottleType
Enum for the type of wine bottle.
Wine.WineColor
Enum for the color of the wine.
